buildCommand: npm run build --workspace @pathfinder/web && python -c "from pathlib import Path; import shutil; root=Path('.'); target=root/'.next'; src=root/'apps/web/.next'; shutil.rmtree(target, ignore_errors=True); shutil.copytree(src, target); m=target/'server/app/(marketing)'; m.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True); src_manifest=target/'server/app/page_client-reference-manifest.js'; dst_manifest=m/'page_client-reference-manifest.js'; shutil.copy2(src_manifest, dst_manifest) if src_manifest.exists() else None"
